meanings.definition: A woman who seeks adventure or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The group of adventuresses embarked on a thrilling journey through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She admired the courage of the adventuresses who climbed the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The adventuresses decided to explore the mysterious cave for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was like that of the adventuresses, always seeking new thrills.
meanings.sent5: The adventuresses' tales of daring escapades inspired others to seek their own adventures.

meanings.definition: Women who engage in risky or unconventional activities.
meanings.sent1: The adventuresses were known for their fearless skydiving stunts.
meanings.sent2: People were amazed by the daring feats of the adventuresses.
meanings.sent3: The adventuresses' idea of a relaxing weekend involved bungee jumping.
meanings.sent4: In the world of extreme sports, the adventuresses were legends.
meanings.sent5: The adventuresses' unconventional approach to life inspired others to step out of their comfort zones.
